price: 64. Smeed dus jullie planen stel je daarna in een rij op, en iedereen die deze dag overleeft zal zeker slagen.”
arabic: فَأَجۡمِعُواْ كَيۡدَكُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱئۡتُواْ صَفّٗاۚ وَقَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَعۡلَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-ajmiʿū kaydakum thumma i'tū ṣaffan waqad aflaḥa al-yawma mani is'taʿlā
